title: Bloody Coffee
description: A complex, suspenseful and engrossing tale of doubts, trust, budding romance, and two bullets. In Tel Aviv, eighteen-year-old New Yorker Leigh is stuck between a rock and a hard place, attempting to validate her mother’s journal and finding out who her biological father is. Leigh’s complicated and, at times, painful journey becomes tangled with events and people she meets along the way. Leigh is determined to uncover the truth – nothing can deter her.
author: Michelle Dim-St. Pierre
